title: Qoddi
description: An App Platform as a service for web apps, microservices (like APIs) unlimited traffic and has no vendor locking with the use of docker container
descriptionOfFreePlan: 3 free Dev app with unlimited bandwidth and never sleeps

comparisonInfo.supportedLanguage: NodeJs, PHP, Python, Docker, Ruby and Rails, Laravel, Java, Rust, Go, Redwood, Gatsby, Gradle, NuxtJs
comparisonInfo.supportedDatabase: Postgres, MariaDB, MongoDB, Redis, MySQL, ArangoDB, ElasticSearch
